commits.author: Chris M. Hostetter
commits.sourceNew:
/** * The total number of documents in the index that were "scanned" by * the index when collecting the {@see #getNumberCollected()} documents * that triggered this exception. *

* This number represents the sum of: *

*
    *
  • The total number of documents in all AtomicReaders * that were fully exhausted during collection *
    • *
  • The id of the last doc collected in the last AtomicReader * consulted during collection. *
    • *
**/ public int getNumberScanned() { return numberScanned; }
